gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਅਲ ਕਮਲ ਕਮਲ ਬਾਸ ਲੇਤ ਫਿਰੈ ਕਾਹੂੰ ੲੇਕ ਪਦਮ ਕੈ ਸੰਪਟ ਸਮਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Al Kamal Kamal Baas Layt Dhirai , Kaahoon Ayk Padam Kai Sanpat Samaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a bumble bee hops from one lotus flower to -another, but sucking nectar from anyone flower at the time of Sunset, it gets arrested in its box-like petals,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਪੰਛੀ ਬਿਰਖ ਬਿਰਖ ਫਲ ਖਾਤ ਫਿਰੈ ਬਰਹਨੇ ਬਿਰਖ ਬੈਠੇ ਰਜਨੀ ਬਿਹਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Panchhee Birakh Birakh Dhal Khaat Dhirai , Barahanay Birakh Baitthay Rajanee Bihaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a bird keeps hoping from one tree to the other eating all types of fruits but spends night on a branch of any tree,

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤੌ ਬ੍ਰਯਾਪਾਰੀ ਹਾਟਿ ਹਾਟਿ ਕੈ ਦੇਖਤ ਫਿਰੈ ਬਿਰਲੈ ਕੀ ਹਾਟਿ ਬੈਠ ਬਨਜ ਲੇ ਜਾਤ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tau Byaapaaree Haati Haati Kai Daykhat Dhirai , Biralai Kee Haati Baitth Banaj Lay Jaat Hai ?
translation: Just as a trader keeps seeing commodities in every shop but purchases goods from anyone of them,

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਹੀ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਰਤਨ ਖੋਜਤ ਖੋਜੀ ਕੋਟਿ ਮਧੇ ਕਾਹੂ ਸੰਗ ਰੰਗ ਲਪਟਾਤ ਹੈ ॥੫੮੯॥
transliteration: Taisay Hee Gur Sabad Ratan Khojat Khojee , Koti Madhay Kaahoo Sang Rang Lapataat Hai ?589?
translation: Similarly, the seeker of jewel-like Guru's words searches the jewel mine-the True Guru. Amongst many fake Gurus, there is a rare saintly person in whose holy feet a liberation seeker absorbs his mind. (He searches for the True Guru, obtains the elixir of
